questions.question: While playing with your dog, he accidently bites your hand and it begins to bleed.

choices.answer: Put a bandaid on it
Call a doctor
Wash it with soap and cover the cut
Run it under warm water

questions.question: After a morning hike, you discover a tick on your leg, what do you do?

choices.answer: Try and brush it off.
Burn it off
Cover it with petroleum jelly to suffocate it
Wash it off

questions.question: While at the beach, a bee stings you on the arm.  It begins to swell and hurt.  What do you do?

choices.answer: Remove the stinger if possible
Take some medicine for the pain
Wash the area where you were stung

questions.question: After you remove the stinger, what should you do?

choices.answer: Try and cool the arm with cold water or an ice pack.
Wash the arm in hot water
Cover the sting spot with a bandage

questions.question: After a walk in the woods, you break out in a rash that looks like poison ivy.

choices.answer: Scrub the rash area with a cloth or brush
Wash the rash area gently with soap and water
Put lotion on the rash area

questions.question: After you gently wash the rash area, what should you do?

choices.answer: Put on calamine lotion to ease the itching
Scratch the bumps to ease the itching
Wrap your arm in bandages

questions.question: While chopping fruit you accidently cut your finger, and it won't stop bleeding.

choices.answer: Hold your cut finger under cold running water
Hold your finger under warm running water
Wrap a napkin around your finger

questions.question: You get a splinter in your finger, what should you do?

choices.answer: Wash the area first, then use sterile tweezers to remove it
Pull it out with your fingers
Wash it in warm water, and wait for it to fall out

questions.question: You get sand in your eye while you are at the beach, what should you do?

choices.answer: Rub your eye
Use a mirror to see where the sand is
Wash it out with water

questions.question: If the sand is on your eye lid what should you do to remove it?

choices.answer: Use a moist cloth to lightly touch it and remove it
Rub your eye until it falls out
Wash your eye out with water

questions.question: While playing softball you get hit in the face and your nose starts to bleed.

choices.answer: Put Kleenex in your nose to stop the bleeding
Tip your head back
Lean forward and pinch soft part of your nose

questions.question: While playing basketball, your friend falls and hits his head and is knocked unconscious.

choices.answer: Call 911 first
Try and wake him up
Splash cold water on his face

questions.question: After you call 911 what should you do?

choices.answer: Cover him with a blanket, keep him lying down if he wakes up
Splash cold water on his neck
Try and move him

questions.question: Your brother scares your mom, and she faints, what should you do?

choices.answer: Splash cold water on her face
Make sure she is lying on his back, with her legs elevated
Wait for her
Call the police

questions.question: If your mom hasn't regained consciousness within two minutes what should you do?

choices.answer: Give her CPR
Call 911
Rub her head and neck
